posts.post_content:
Two more cards for sale - both are the slightly more difficult Fac25  back.  Take the pair for $110 or $60 ea.

Abbaticchio was one of my first T206s - purchased in about 1992.  Looks like it may be trimmed, but looks really nice, none-the-less.

[IMG]http://i186.photobucket.com/albums/x51/frohme/9349_zpsual4uuff.jpg[/IMG]

Leach has been with me for 15 years or so.  Gorgeous card - also likely trimmed.

[IMG]http://i186.photobucket.com/albums/x51/frohme/10009_zpscdbftfsi.jpg[/IMG]

Thanks for looking.

--
Mike
